name: Throwdown in Little Heights
description:
Alexandria isn't the warrior she used to be. Years after the harrowing defeat that ended her natural life, she's living quietly in the cliffside town of Little Heights and still finds herself unable to fight. Help a skeleton warrior get her mojo back!

A Short Game By:

Ciarán Golding (@Barrelbot)
